fulltext:
Truong Nguyen Quoc Dat  
Profile: quocdat1994.github.io | Email: quocdat1994@gmail.com | Mobile: 037 955 7887  
Vuon Chuoi Street, 4th Ward, 3rd District, Ho Chi Minh City  
SUMMARY  
A developer with 3 years of experience, specializing in Front-End development. Easily collaborate in a team or 
work independently. Experience in agile development processes. Love creation, enjoy problems solving and 
researching new technology.  
SKILL  
Technical skills:  
 Javascript , JQuery, React.js 
 HTML, Bootstrap 
 CSS, SASS 
 Java, Android 
 Git 
 Agile/Scrum Methodology  
Soft skills:  
 English (Advanced) 
 Teamwork 
 Communication 
 Time Management 
 Research 
EXPERIENCE 
Web Developer 
NHN Vietnam 
July 2018 - Present 
 Maintaining and developing new features for webtoon portals.  
 Collaborating in a team of 5 members.  
 Using Java for Back-End and Javascript/jQuery, HTML, CSS for Front-End. 
Editor in Chief 
SENO Ltd. 
July 2013 - Dec 2018 
 Wrote and edited magazine articles.  
 Planned new content for each issue.  
 Non-IT related job. 
Software Developer 
Persol Process & Technology Vietnam 
Oct 2015 - Oct 2017 
 Collaborated in small teams following the Agile Methodology. 
 Interacted directly with clients in Japan.  
 Developed and customized android/web applications based on client’s requests. 
 Using SourceTree (Git) to manage code and Trello to control tasks. 
EDUCATION 
Bachelor of IT 
RMIT Vietnam 
2013 - 2016 
 Degree in Application Programming. 
 Graduated with Distinction.
